name: Denki
long_description:
Automate internal auditing (planning, testing, documenting) to comply better with financial regulations.

Denki is the assurance platform that:

✔️ Works on existing systems (e.g. Auditboard, Jira, ERPs)
✔️ Automates Control processes (e.g. maps to COSO, runs walkthrough interviews, tests)
✔️ Produces working papers (w/ full audit traces)

Focused on SOX programs and financial regulations (BSA/AML etc.)
one_liner: AI for Auditors at Public Companies
